original_text:
because they turned from following him
    and had no regard for any of his ways.
korean_text: 그들이 그를 떠나고 그의 모든 길을 깨달아 알지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: because they turned from following him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 따르는 것을 돌이켰기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and had no regard for any of his ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 길에 대한 존중심이 없었고
